text:
Transfix | Engineering Manager, Lead Data Scientist, Product Manager (Data), Mid-Sr Front-end and Back-end Engineers| NYC | On-site

Transfix is creating a marketplace to connect shippers with truck drivers. We're in a $400B industry that's ripe for automation. We're dedicated to reducing the amount of miles being wasted by optimizing the way shipments are handled from creation to delivery. We just raised our Series C recently at $42M!

Tech stack: Aurelia.js, react.js, es6, ruby on rails, postgres, AWS

You can read more abouat us here: https://goo.gl/EJ27fD

General Process (may vary slightly by role): Recruiter Screen (20min) > Tech Screen (1hr) > On-site Interview (3-4hrs)

If interested, please apply on our jobs site (https://jobs.lever.co/transfix) or reach out to me at jamesgallagher@transfix.io
